name: Pavel Torbeev
aboutTitle: Hi, my name is Pavel and I am a frontend developer
aboutDescription:
I love great interfaces, coding, and pies. I enjoy creating something cool and useful, drawing attention to worthy things. I love productive work and can't stand bureaucracy. Not a fan of calls—texting is better.

I'm interested not just in the web but in various tech projects. I like everything related to smart homes, automation, and new technologies. Always open to interesting challenges.

burn.title: Born in Tomsk
burn.description: A small, cozy city in Siberia with a population of just over 500,000 people.

school_start.title: First day at school
school_start.description: Back then, I had no idea that code and pixels were waiting for me ahead.

internet.title: Discovery of the Internet
internet.description: When I got access to the internet, I started experimenting with HTML and CSS, modifying ready-made pages to my liking. Later, I got into Macromedia Flash and discovered ActionScript — a distant relative of JavaScript.

young_talents.title: Victory in the 'Young Talents' competition
young_talents.description: Won 1st place at the city science and technology conference for school students in informatics.

macromedia.title: Macromedia Flash project
macromedia.description: Received an honorary diploma from the dean for a multimedia project. This was when I realized I loved creating interactive things.

school_end.title: Graduated from school
school_end.description: I had to choose between electronics and web development. I picked electronics—but that didn't last forever.

tusur_start.title: Enrolled in TUSUR
tusur_start.description: Studied at Tomsk State University of Control Systems and Radioelectronics but never stopped being passionate about web development.

urban_tom_ru.title: urban.tom.ru
urban_tom_ru.description: Launched a youth-focused website with friends, organizing flash mobs and various events based on it.

freelance.title: Freelancing
freelance.description: During university, I started building websites on WordPress and Drupal, creating custom designs for clients.

practice.title: Summer internship
practice.description: Developed a website for the university's media department. My first serious experience working on a real project.

it_project.title: Grand Prix in the 'IT Project' competition
it_project.description: A website I created for the SunDali music band won first place.

six_hand_shake.title: Participation in Startup Village
six_hand_shake.description: Developed and presented the '6 Handshakes' project.

tusur_end.title: Graduated from university
tusur_end.description: Got my diploma, but web development was what truly excited me.

first_work.title: First job
first_work.description: Started working in my field, but building websites remained my biggest passion.

userstory.title: UserStory
userstory.description: Officially transitioned into web development. My passion became my profession.

varys.title: VARYS
varys.description: A new stage in my frontend development career.

saint_p.title: Moved to Saint Petersburg
saint_p.description: New city, new opportunities, a new level of growth.

org_one.title: ORG1
org_one.description: Even more experience, projects, and challenges.

war.title: Thirst for travel
war.description: At some point, I realized I craved more freedom and new experiences.

za4et.title: Za4et Radio
za4et.description: With a group of enthusiasts, we launched Za4et Radio within the student business incubator.

performica.title: Performica
performica.description: Continuing to work on awesome projects.

communication.label: Communication
communication.help_text: Explaining complex things in simple terms

adaptive.label: Adaptability
adaptive.help_text: Ability to learn new things quickly
